titleStmt.title: An act for holding an assize for the County of Lancaster. Friday, August 5. 1659. Ordered by the Parliament, that this Act be forthwith printed and published. Tho. St Nicholas, Clerk of the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Field, printer to the Parliament. And are to be sold at the seven Stars in Fleetstreet, over against Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: Title ornament; initial letter; text in black letter.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the seven Stars in Fleetstreet, over against Dunstans Church
